arts.ttl: Arsenal 3-1 Southampton: Player ratings as Saka stars in hard-fought Gunners win
arts.sum: The Gunners continued to pressurise Southampton as a frustrating first half drew to a close, with Raheem Sterling's curling effort blocked by Jan Bednarek and Thomas Partey's long-range strike parried by Ramsdale. Havertz and Saka saw half-chances come and go but it was defensive midfielder Jorginho who came closest to firing Arsenal ahead.

arts.ttl: Bukayo Saka unleashes Arsenal’s ‘fire’ and shows he can lead them to the title
arts.sum: Arsenal 3-1 Southampton: Saka set up Kai Havertz for the equaliser before adding a goal of his own as the Gunners defeated Southampton

arts.ttl: Arsenal hit back to see off Southampton and keep the pace at the top
arts.sum: The away side had briefly threatened to cause an upset.

arts.ttl: Aaron Ramsdale opens up on 'difficult' decision to leave Arsenal
arts.sum: Speaking to Sky Sports about his decision to leave the Emirates Stadium, Ramsdale revealed that he left the club in search of regular minutes in the Premier League: Since then, the goalkeeper has started four Premier League games for the Saints, just two starts shy of his total for the 2023/24 campaign at Arsenal.

arts.ttl: Arsenal vs Southampton: Preview, predictions and lineups
arts.sum: Arsenal's bid to reclaim the Premier League title for the first time in over 20 years continues on Saturday afternoon when Southampton arrive at the Emirates Stadium. Southampton slipped to their fifth defeat in six league games on Monday night but there's unlikely to be a whole raft of changes implemented by manager Russell Martin.

arts.ttl: Why is Arsenal vs Southampton not on TV in UK? How to watch Premier League match
arts.sum: Arsenal fans will be a expecting another three points in the Premier League when they host Southampton - here's how to follow the action from the Emirates

arts.ttl: Kai Havertz eyes Robin van Persie feat as Arsenal look to emulate Man United in Southampton clash
arts.sum: Arsenal and Kai Havertz will both have the opportunity to achieve impressive feats in Saturday's Premier League meeting with Southampton at the Emirates Stadium.

arts.ttl: Arsenal v Southampton: FPL team news + predicted line-ups
arts.sum: Team form, absentees and our predicted XIs The post Arsenal v Southampton: FPL team news + predicted line-ups appeared first on Best FPL Tips, Advice, Team News, Picks, and Statistics from Fantasy Football Scout.

arts.ttl: Arsenal boss Mikel Arteta ready to call Aaron Ramsdale's bluff on Emirates return
arts.sum: Former Arsenal goalkeeper Aaron Ramsdale returns to the Emirates Stadium on Saturday to face his former side, having yet to taste a Premier League win at new club Southampton

arts.ttl: Mikel Arteta suggests that he will look to confuse Aaron Ramsdale with set-piece plans as former Arsenal goalkeeper returns to Emirates Stadium with Southampton
arts.sum: ISAAN KHAN: The goalkeeper left the Gunners over the summer in a four-year deal worth up to £25million, having largely occupied the bench after losing his starting spot to David Raya.
